wikipedia_page.main: Edwin James  (born 1869) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1893 and 1899, playing 8 matches and scoring 2 goals. He played his first match on 13 March 1893 against England and his last match on 4 March 1899 against Ireland.
